subject: Baseplate not received – Order issue
description_text:
Hi,
I received my order today, but the base plate was missing from the package.
Can you confirm if it has been shipped separately, and if so, please
provide the tracking number?
Order number:  SSN3644
Thanks!

conversations.body_text: Hi Nimród Bolyki,       I apologize for not getting back to you sooner. I see your package has been delivered—did you receive it?
